## gf_friends

## Description
Graph of friends in a social network. 


## Usage
```r
gf_friends(sc) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| sc | A Spark connection. |





## Examples
```{r, eval=ecodown::examples_not_run()}
library(graphframes)
library(sparklyr) 
sc <- spark_connect(master = "local") 
gf_friends(sc) 
```
